attributes.action: Increase delivery drivers pay who are risking every day their lives.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament it's giving 2500£/month for the self employers that are staying home and there are drivers risking their lives daily for 1700£/month
attributes.background: Need to give hazard pay for all the drivers who are risking their lives every day

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
